pages.text: $(li)Wither Skeletons are a variant of the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/skeleton)Skeletons$(/l) that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:structures/fortress)Nether Fortresses$(/l) of the Nether.$(br)$(li)When they hit you, they will inflict you the Wither effect, reducing your life every two seconds as the $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/poison)Poison$(/l), but unlike this last one, this one will not stop damaging you while you have half heart of life.

They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone)Bones$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/coal)Coal$(/l), rarely $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l), and very rarely a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/wither_skeleton_skull)Wither Skeleton Skull$(/l) upon death.

$(li)Tiny Wither Skeletons are a cute variant of the Wither Skeletons and they can be found very rarely in the $(l:patchouli:structures/fortress)Nether Fortresses$(/l).$(br)$(li)When you are close of one of them, it will run quickly for you.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone)Bones$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/coal)Coal$(/l), and always will drop the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/wither_skeleton_skull)Wither Skeleton Skull$(/l) that they are carrying in their hands upon death.
